amendatorysection.catchline: Claimant; rights; recovery under act; effect.
amendatorysection.para: Nothing in the Nebraska Claims for Wrongful Conviction and Imprisonment Act shall limit the claimant from making any other claim available against any other party or based upon any other theory of recovery, except that a claimant who recovers a claim under the act shall not have any other claim against the state based upon any other theory of recovery or law.
